articles.title: India vs Sri Lanka Highlights: IND win eighth Asia Cup title with 10-wicket win - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India vs Sri Lanka Highlights, Asia Cup 2023 Final: Gill and Kishan did the job in 6.1 overs after Siraj's six-wicket haul blew Sri Lanka away for 50.
articles.content:
India vs Sri Lanka Live Score: This is the lowest ODI total by a team against India, going past the 58 from Bangladesh in Mirpur in 2014.

articles.title: No Sunil Chhetri, Sandesh Jhingan for China match: Igor Stimac - The Bridge
articles.description: India might not field Sunil Chhetri, Sandesh Jhingan vs China and focus on the games against Bangladesh and Myanmar to make it out of the group stage at the 2023 Asian Games, says Igor Stimac.
